long_description: The C.A.M.P. USA Wing 2 Traveling pulley makes travel on zip lines and rope courses easy, efficient and tons of fun. Attaching participants to a line or rope is fast and easy with the locking pivot mechanism; mechanism also ensures that the pulley cannot detach from the line while loaded. Efficient steel bearings roll smoothly and allow for high-speed fun; stainless-steel sheaves stand up to regular use. C.A.M.P. USA Wing 2 Traveling pulley has thermoplastic guards that prevent accidental entanglement with clothing and hair. Upright thermoplastic prongs hold the carabiner in your pulley backup system off of the zip line or rope to limit drag and offer a smooth ride.
short_description: The C.A.M.P. USA Wing 2 Traveling pulley makes travel on zip lines and rope courses easy, efficient and tons of fun.
